visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has specific margins set to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color (#2caffe) applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. Additional navigation menu items are styled with a left border and no border radius.
